title: Omicron versus the world: Your questions answered
description: As the Omicron variant spreads around the world and cases surge, BBC correspondents tell us how Covid-19 is impacting our lives, our businesses and our economies.
itunes:subtitle: The facts, the science, the politics, the economics and the myths
itunes:summary: As the Omicron variant spreads around the world and cases surge, BBC correspondents tell us how Covid-19 is impacting our lives, our businesses and our economies.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
